cleaned_text: Learn More and Live Better Read the latest items in our blog. The [Center for Integrative Medicine](/services/integrative-medicine/center-for-integrative-medicine) provides physician-grade herb, vitamin and mineral supplements that adhere to the highest standards of quality and production. Our herb and supplement formulations can only be sold by health care professionals, and are science-based, tested and trusted worldwide. Herbs, essential oils, supplements and topical treatments can be beneficial for a variety of ailments, including the following: During your consultation, you will meet with a functional medicine specialist or acupuncturist who will perform a brief, non-invasive medical examination and work with you based on your medical history and wellness goals to establish a plan that is right for you. Our experts work alongside conventional treatments to complement your current care, reviewing labs and other tests as needed and ensuring any medications you are taking will not negatively interact with herbs or supplements. If you are already receiving [acupuncture](/services/integrative-medicine/center-for-integrative-medicine/acupuncture) from one of our providers, you can speak with your acupuncturist about incorporating herbs and supplements into your treatment plan. All of our products undergo thorough testing to verify that they contain the exact ingredients they specify, and that they are toxin and metal free. Appointments must be made with an acupuncturist. In addition to being sold at our physical location, our products are also available for purchase online.
